alfredsnippet.snippet:
(cont'd)

[Contributed by Mel Acheson, who added: "In this regard, the passive-voice style of scientific writing is hypocritical, even mendacious. It obscures the human cognitive origin of the ideas and has institutionalized the scotoma -- the misprision -- that fails to see scientific truth as a human expression. Whence cometh the pseudo-religion, scientism, with its official state-sanctioned ecclesiolatry -- NASA."]
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Vico on Understanding Former People - Part 5
